law.catch_line: This section only applies to vending machines in public schools that sell food items of minimal nutr...

text.section: This section only applies to vending machines in public schools that sell food items of minimal nutritional value, as defined by the Department.

By August 1, 2006, vending machines in public schools shall have and use a timing device to automatically prohibit or allow access to vending machines in accordance with the nutrition policies established by the county board.
